questions.question: Iyiphi ingxenye yesitshalo eyenza ama-carbohydrates ngesikhathi sokuphotosynthesis?
questions.explanation: Amahlamvu ayingxenye yesitshalo eyenza ukudla ngokusebenzisa ukukhanya kwelanga.

questions.question: Ke eng yeo e diregago ka gare ga sel?
questions.explanation: Photosynthesis ke tshepedišo yeo e diregago ka gare ga disel tša dimela.

questions.question: Wat is 'n voorbeeld van vaste koste?
questions.explanation: Huur is 'n vaste koste omdat dit elke maand dieselfde bedrag is.
